item.title: fedora: make gnome title bar smaller
item.description: Source.echo ' window.ssd headerbar.titlebar { padding-top: 4px; padding-bottom: 4px; min-height: 0; } window.ssd headerbar.titlebar button.titlebutton { padding: 0px; min-height: 0; min-width: 0; } ' > ~/.config/gtk-3.0/gtk.css
